ISBN-13: 9780300090956.
ISBN-10: 0300090951.
Title: Leonardo on Painting.
Subtitle: An Anthology of Writings by Leonardo Da Vinci, with a Selection of Documents Relating to His Career as an Artist.
Authors: Leonardo.
Categories: Art.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=roHf588GZJYC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&edge=curl&source=gbs_api.
Description: This is a selection of Leonardo da Vinci's writings on painting. Martin Kemp and Margaret Walker have edited material not only from his so-called Treatise on Painting but also from his surviving manuscripts and from other primary sources..
Published Year: 2001.
